content.paragraph:
An Asteroid inspired game mixed with elements from tower defense. The player must shoot incoming asteroids to protect the space station, which the player can preposition when they attach/dock to it.
This Unity game demo was developed over 6 weeks by a group of 4 developers. I was the principle programmer, implementing the core gameplay mechanics and systems. It was one of the earliest games I worked on and a foundational step in my journey in games development.
